summary: Comprehensive end-to-end testing of gym membership management system completed successfully. Tested all major features including member management, attendance tracking, payment processing, inventory management, and reporting functionality. System is fully functional with excellent integration between frontend and backend.

minor_issues.issue: DELETE method was missing but has been fixed during testing
minor_issues.impact: Inventory item deletion was not possible

integration_issues.issue: Some 404 console errors during initial data fetch, but data loads correctly

passed_tests: ✅ API Health Check - Backend is running correctly
✅ Member Creation - All required fields working, QR code generated automatically
✅ Member Search & Filtering - Search by name, filter by status and membership type
✅ Manual Check-in - Quick check-in from dashboard working perfectly
✅ Payment Processing - Add payments for members with all payment methods
✅ Inventory Management - Add, edit, search inventory items with categories
✅ Dashboard Statistics - Real-time updates of all metrics
✅ Attendance Tracking - List and calendar views working
✅ Reports Generation - Basic attendance reports functional
✅ Navigation - All page transitions working smoothly
✅ Bilingual Support - Portuguese interface working correctly
✅ Data Persistence - All CRUD operations saving to database
✅ Form Validation - Required fields properly validated
✅ Responsive Design - UI adapts well to different screen sizes
